justification: “To distinguish those who learned the function from those who only tracked rewards, participants in the FMAB conditions completed a functional knowledge task… Achieving good performance in this task required participants to generalize functional knowledge they had acquired during the bandit task.”
construct: functional knowledge of the feature–reward function

justification: “We study participants' behavior in feature-based multi-armed bandit tasks… learning requires participants to trade off between exploration and exploitation.”
“Participants have to estimate the expected rewards of each option… We constrained the range for the estimates to be between 0 and 50.”

measured_by: Confidence Rating Scale (1–10) used within Estimation Task
justification: “…and express how confident they are in their estimates. … the confidence ratings were entered on a scale from 1 (low confidence) to 10 (high confidence).”
“After reading the instructions, participants completed an attention check questionnaire and were sent back to the instructions if they had answered any of the questions incorrectly.”
